00050 #include <stdio.h>
00051 #include <stdlib.h>             // for atof()
00052 #include "mscb.h"

00054 char code node_name[] = "TC600";
00055 
00056 /* declare number of sub-addresses to framework */
00057 unsigned char idata _n_sub_addr = 1;
00058 
00059 bit terminal_mode;
00060 
00061 unsigned char tc600_write(unsigned short param, unsigned char len, unsigned long value);
00062 
00063 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ----*/
00064 
00065 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00066 
00067 struct {
00068    unsigned char pump_on;
00069    unsigned char vent_on;
00070    unsigned short rot_speed;
00071    float tmp_current;
00072 
00073    unsigned char baud;
00074    unsigned char address;
00075 } idata user_data;
00076 
00077 
00078 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00079    1, UNIT_ASCII,   0, 0, MSCBF_DATALESS, "RS232", 0,
00080    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0,              0, "Pump on", &user_data.pump_on,
00081    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0,              0, "Vent on", &user_data.vent_on,
00082    2, UNIT_HERTZ,   0, 0,              0, "RotSpd", &user_data.rot_speed,
00083    4, UNIT_AMPERE,  0, 0,    MSCBF_FLOAT, "TMPcur", &user_data.tmp_current,
00084 
00085    1, UNIT_BAUD,    0, 0,              0, "Baud", &user_data.baud,
00086    1, UNIT_BYTE,    0, 0,              0, "Address", &user_data.address,
00087    0
00088 };

00096 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant;
00097 void write_gain(void);
00098 
00099 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00100 
00101 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00102 {
00103    /* initialize UART1 */
00104    if (init) {
00105       user_data.baud = 1;       // 9600 by default
00106       user_data.address = 1;
00107    }
00108 
00109    uart_init(1, user_data.baud);
00110 
00111    /* turn on turbo pump motor (not pump station) */
00112    tc600_write(23, 6, 111111);
00113 
00114    /* vent mode */
00115    tc600_write(30, 3, 0);
00116 
00117    delay_ms(0);                 // linker bug otherwise!
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00121 
00122 /* buffers in mscbmain.c */
00123 extern unsigned char xdata in_buf[300], out_buf[300];
00124 
00125 #pragma NOAREGS
00126 
00127 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00128 {
00129    unsigned char i, n;
00130 
00131    if (index == 0) {
00132       if (in_buf[2] == 27)
00133          terminal_mode = 0;
00134       else if (in_buf[2] == 0)
00135          terminal_mode = 1;
00136       else {
00137          n = (in_buf[0] & 0x07) - 1;
00138          for (i = 0; i < n; i++)
00139             putchar(in_buf[i + 2]);
00140       }
00141    }
00142 
00143    if (index == 5)
00144       uart_init(1, user_data.baud);
00145 }
00146 
00147 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00148 
00149 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00150 {
00151    char c;
00152 
00153    if (index == 0) {
00154       c = getchar_nowait();
00155       if (c != -1) {
00156          out_buf[1] = c;
00157          return 1;
00158       }
00159    }
00160 
00161    return 0;
00162 }
00163 
00164 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00165 
00166 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00167 {
00168    /* echo input data */
00169    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00170    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00171    return 2;
00172 }

00174 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00175 
00176 unsigned char tc600_read(unsigned short param, char *result)
00177 {
00178    char idata str[32];
00179    unsigned char i, j, cs, len;
00180 
00181    sprintf(str, "%03Bd00%03d02=?", user_data.address, param);
00182 
00183    for (i = cs = 0; i < 12; i++)
00184       cs += str[i];
00185 
00186    sprintf(str + 12, "%03Bd\r", cs);
00187    printf(str);
00188    flush();
00189    i = gets_wait(str, sizeof(str), 200);
00190    if (i > 2) {
00191       len = (str[8] - '0') * 10 + (str[9] - '0');
00192 
00193       for (j = 0; j < len; j++)
00194          result[j] = str[10 + j];
00195 
00196       result[j] = 0;
00197       return len;
00198    }
00199 
00200    return 0;
00201 }
00202 
00203 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00204 
00205 unsigned char tc600_write(unsigned short param, unsigned char len, unsigned long value)
00206 {
00207    char idata str[32];
00208    unsigned char i, cs;
00209 
00210    if (len == 6)
00211       sprintf(str, "%03Bd10%03d06%06ld", user_data.address, param, value);
00212    else if (len == 3)
00213       sprintf(str, "%03Bd10%03d03%03ld", user_data.address, param, value);
00214 
00215    for (i = cs = 0; i < 16; i++)
00216       cs += str[i];
00217 
00218    sprintf(str + 16, "%03Bd\r", cs);
00219    printf(str);
00220    flush();
00221    i = gets_wait(str, sizeof(str), 200);
00222 
00223    return i;
00224 }
00225 
00226 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00227 
00228 void user_loop(void)
00229 {
00230    char idata str[32];
00231    static unsigned long last = 0;
00232    static char pump_on_last = -1;
00233    static char vent_on_last = -1;
00234 
00235    if (!terminal_mode && time() > last + 100) {
00236       last = time();
00237 
00238       if (user_data.pump_on != pump_on_last) {
00239          tc600_write(10, 6, user_data.pump_on ? 111111 : 0);
00240          pump_on_last = user_data.pump_on;
00241       }
00242 
00243       if (user_data.vent_on != vent_on_last) {
00244          tc600_write(12, 6, user_data.vent_on ? 111111 : 0);
00245          vent_on_last = user_data.vent_on;
00246       }
00247 
00248       if (tc600_read(309, str))
00249          user_data.rot_speed = atoi(str);
00250 
00251       if (tc600_read(310, str))
00252          user_data.tmp_current = atoi(str) / 100.0;
00253    }
00254 }
